import sys

for i in range(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
    daffa=int(sys.stdin.readline())
    final={}
    votes=0
    for j in range(daffa):
        data=sys.stdin.readline().split()
        final[data[0]]=data[1]
    for i in final.values():
        if i=="+":
            votes+=1
        else:
            votes-=1
    print votes
